title: During the black plague, what were some of the symptoms of the fever? - Quora

response.answer_text: A good layman’s discussion of the topic may be found at: Plague Symptoms, Treatment & History of the Black Death Responses should be considered general in nature, and not specific to any one person; consequently, they are not to be construed as specific medical advice and do not create a doctor/patient relationship. For more specific advice unique to your particular situation, consult a local medical professional.
